message.caption: Bring JenkinsCI to the Enterprise with CloudBees
message.blurb: Amp up your Jenkins with professional support, enterprise plugins, and a multi-master operations center… and get Jenkins in the cloud

message.caption: Pay Attention to Security Advisory
message.blurb: Running Jenkins on the internet facing machine? You should pay attention to our security advisories

message.caption: Jenkins User Conference 2014
message.blurb: Jenkins User Conference in this year will be held in Boston, Berlin, Israel, San Francisco Bay Area, and in Australia/New Zealand. See you soon
